name: Crepuscule Armor

items.alias: Large Patch of Hard Novictum Spangled Hide
Large Patch of Hard Living Hide
Large Patch of Soft Novictum Spangled Hide
Patch of Soft Novictum Spangled Hide
Patch of Hard Novictum Spangled Hide
Small Patch of Soft Novictum Spangled Hide
Small Patch of Hard Novictum Spangled Hide

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ a Patch of Novictum Spangled Hide ( ie : #L "Large Patch of Hard Novictum Spangled Hide" "223432" ) #L "Canister of Pure Liquid Notum" "223446" A Spirit Baube of Expertise ( ie : #L "Spirit Bauble of Infantry Expertise" "223435" ) ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Canister of Pure Liquid Notum + Patch of Novictum Spangled Hide = Patch of Living Hide ( ie #L "Large Patch of Hard Living Hide" "223460" ) Skills: | NP | ------------------------------ A Spirit Baube of Expertise + Patch of Living Hide = Crepuscule Armor ( ie #L "Infantry Crepuscule Leather Gloves" "223086" ) Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ #L "Large Patch of Soft Novictum Spangled Hide" "223430" for Pants #L "Large Patch of Hard Novictum Spangled Hide" "223432" for Jacket #L "Patch of Soft Novictum Spangled Hide" "223428" for Sleeves #L "Patch of Hard Novictum Spangled Hide" "223426" for Boots #L "Small Patch of Soft Novictum Spangled Hide" "223422" for Gloves #L "Small Patch of Hard Novictum Spangled Hide" "223424" for skinchip ie : #L "Infantry Crepuscule Leather Jacket" "223090" #L "Artillery Crepuscule Leather Jacket" "223102" #L "Exterminator Unit Crepuscule Jacket" "223174" #L "Support Unit Crepuscule Jacket" "223401" #L "Control Unit Crepuscule Jacket" "223416" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Very nice armor if you can get your hands on the ingredients. A nice alternative to Alien Armor if you cant afford that.
